comment._content: It looks like there is another photograph of the same portrait. Photograph of a portrait of the Empress Dowager The painting may also belong to the Smithsonian.

comment.author: 11117515@N06
comment._content: The Smithsonian has a huge collection of negative plates taken for the empress dowager Cixi by court photograhers.  It would be great if these photographs are posted as well.
